page.title: 11AN INTERVIEW IN SETTLE
page.content: {Q.What shops used to be in Settle?} A.Many of the shops were in Upper Settle, there was a butchers shop in front of the town hall.In Upper Settle there was the Co_op grocers,a cobblers and a grocery store and a butchers.There were two drapers in the town and a saddlers.{Q.What was there {to do in Settle?}A.There were dances for grownups but there was not a lot for children to do apart from going for walks with your parents and playing marbles.There were not many clubs.{Q.What did you play?}A.Whip and top,skipping,marbles,running,going for walks and splashing and paddling in the river.{Q.What sort of traffic was {there?}A.Mostly horse drawn carts.If there was a car,all the children went running because it was special.{
